description:
Circuit Superstars is an indie car racing game developed by Square Enix London Studios and Original Fire Games. It has cartoony pixel art graphics and focuses on classic arcade-style motor racing across 12 different track layouts.

The gameplay aims to capture the feel of 80s and 90s arcade racing classics with tight controls, generous vehicle drifting, and overtaking opportunities. There is a campaign mode with 16 different events and a roster of 12 different cars to unlock and upgrade. The cars have different speed, handling and drift stats that shape the racing style and strategy.

Overall, Circuit Superstars focuses on pick-up and play fun arcade racing that emphasizes skill over vehicle upgrades. The bright colorful graphics and chiptune soundtrack help give it a retro vibe while still providing modern features like online multiplayer, custom event creation and Ghost modes. The simple yet deep controls allow for last minute maneuvers and passes that reward skilled driving.
name: Circuit Superstars
